We are committed to providing a supportive platform where individuals can flourish intellectually, collaborate passionately, and develop into influential leaders in their respective disciplines. Our [mission](mission.html) is to foster a vibrant community that nurtures the personal and professional growth of postdoctoral fellows in the fields of statistics, biostatistics, and data science.

## News

**ASAPA advocates for public access to federal data and economic statistical statistical infrastructure. Opportunities for collective letters to Congress.** You can find the more details [here](blog/comm_concern).
